data.name: SuperTrucks Offroad
data.detailed_description:
The Massive 2.2 Update has just been released! 3 years worth of development improvements...


  • Brand new UI design
  • Overhauled the in-game graphics
  • Updates to many of the tracks and textures
  • Loads of improvements to the physics, suspension and handling
  • AI improvements
  • Career mode expanded from 64 to 234 events. The first 117 events are in regular mode, and the next 117 are in hardcode mode.
  • Hardcore mode unlocks night racing
  • Added tarmac racing
  • Added new time trial track
  • Upgrade screen completely overhauled, no more dragging of cards
  • Added support for key/controller bindings
  • Too many other smaller improvements to mention

For a full summary of this update, and why we are not releasing these updates as SuperTrucks Offroad 2 as a free to play game, please see this post in the discussions.
https://steamcommunity.com/app/743830/discussions/0/3282573272841630460/
data.about_the_game:
The Massive 2.2 Update has just been released! 3 years worth of development improvements...


  • Brand new UI design
  • Overhauled the in-game graphics
  • Updates to many of the tracks and textures
  • Loads of improvements to the physics, suspension and handling
  • AI improvements
  • Career mode expanded from 64 to 234 events. The first 117 events are in regular mode, and the next 117 are in hardcode mode.
  • Hardcore mode unlocks night racing
  • Added tarmac racing
  • Added new time trial track
  • Upgrade screen completely overhauled, no more dragging of cards
  • Added support for key/controller bindings
  • Too many other smaller improvements to mention

For a full summary of this update, and why we are not releasing these updates as SuperTrucks Offroad 2 as a free to play game, please see this post in the discussions.
https://steamcommunity.com/app/743830/discussions/0/3282573272841630460/
data.short_description: SuperTrucks Offroad is a racing game inspired by the arcade/NES classic 'Ironman Super Offroad' bringing you offroad arcade racing action that is easy to pick up, but hard to master!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Celeron
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATI DirectX9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or ATI DirectX11 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
